articles.description: FMCG stocks have underperformed in 2024 with Nestle, HUL, Asian Paints emerging as the top losers on the Sensex index in the first six months. However, analysts are bullish for long-term opportunities.
articles.content: Fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) stocks have largely underperformed so far in 2024 due to weak base demand, inflation, adverse weather conditions, and lower agri-production growth. However, D-Street… [+11683 chars]
